author: hwright
msg: Address a segfault (and a file descriptor leak) in svnsync of an ra_serf
[ Note: this resolves the segfault but not the FD leak. ]

author: hwright
msg: Fix mod_authz_svn SEGV with AuthzForceUsernameCase and no authentication.
It's an unusal, perhaps pointless, configuration but SEGVs are bad.

author: alexdma
msg: - RegistryManagerImpl now populates the model internally via a two-pass axiom-visiting algorithm.
- Implemented union/merging of library content from multiple registries.
- Deprecated classes and methods that should no longer be used.
- Added javadoc for entire registry API

author: hwright
msg: We still claim to support it.
